entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MailAddress.TryCreate: allow null for the address argument #70920
  • W^X double mapping doesn't work correctly on macOS under Rosetta emulation #70910
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Wrap and Unwrap methods to NegotiateAuthentication API #70909
  • [Analyzer/fixer suggestion]: Exceptions thrown inside async methods should be wrapped by Task.FromException #70905
    8.0.0
  • `Process.Modules` does not list all modules/shared objects of a target process when executed on Linux #70904
  • Remove use of pool and buffer copy in Deserialize(ref Utf8JsonReader reader, ...) #70902
  • Init block morphing is not general enough #70898
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Design application startup, template, configuration #70892
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] fix dotnet.worker.js #70891
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT - Massive failures #70889
  • [wasm] Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core tests for CurrentDirectory fail for Browser on Windows #70887
    7.0.0
  • crash in the application #70886
  • Question: dependency injection how could I intercept the ServiceScope resolve #70882
  • GVM lookup failure in System.Collections.Immutable test #70878
    7.0.0
  • system.drawing.tests.graphicstests tests failing in IsVisibleClipEmpty #70877
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\RVAInit\\nested\\nested.cmd #70876
    7.0.0
  • ilasm round-trip test failures #70875
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\20616\\UnicodeBug\\UnicodeBug.cmd #70873
    7.0.0
  • Use .Net core console program how to obtain cpu/memory utilization #70872
  • Deadlock in EventListener static constructor #70870
    7.0.0

Closed

  • VM #define Sleep macros break GC #7959
    7.0.0
  • Extract_HardLinkEntry_TargetInsideDirectory test from System.Formats.Tar.Tests fails on Android/iOS/tvOS #68360
    7.0.0
  • Tar entries should be able to handle paths that begin with "./", including the root path itself #70516
    7.0.0
  • Capture the thread pool min/max threads config in an event #57247
    7.0.0
  • system.net.http.functional.tests crashing #70757
  • ILLinker NRE on Windows #69536
  • Blazor wasm native dependencies run-time crash in various C function signature configurations #70676
  • Strange runtime failure - unmanaged heap corruption #70860
  • NativeAOT compiler crashes if assembly missing #70815
    Future
  • Make sure there's runtime mapping for delegate Invoke methods #70880
    7.0.0
  • Large numbers of Quic tests failed when run locally #70673
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'assertion->op2.u1.iconFlags != GTF_EMPTY' #70790
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `System.Text.Json`. Add ability to convert a JSON array to `[Flags]` enum #70864
  • TaskCanceledException in msbuild while building on OSX-x64 #69190
  • Consider moving `IFloatingPointIeee754<T>.MaxNumber` down to `INumber<T>` #68191
    7.0.0
  • IBinaryNumber interface does not have an "AllBitsSet" property #60882
    7.0.0
  • Tar API PR accidentally reverted another PR #70575
    7.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo]: Assertion failed 'fgDominate(head, entry)' in 'System.Text.Encoding:GetByteCount(System.String,int,int):int:this' during 'Hoist loop code' (IL size 109; hash 0x10278d31; Tier1) #70802
    7.0.0
  • .NET 5 regression in Math.Min behaviour with NaNs #70775
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: New custom type marshaller features for pay-for-play features #69403
    7.0.0
  • Avoid redundant marshaller copy by introducing `FromManagedValue` method #69031
    7.0.0
  • Marshalling a collection of elements that require two-stage marshalling does not preserve the marshaller state? #69096
    7.0.0
  • Marshal.ReleaseComObject does not account for ComWrappers #54317
    7.0.0
  • `System.Tests.PosixSignalRegistrationTests.SignalCanCancelTermination` is occasionally failing on macOS #63760
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Windows/Arm64: Use 8.1 atomic instructions if they are available #70921
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable IDE0065 (Misplaced using directive) #70919
    area-System.Xml
  • Enable IDE0071 (Simplify interpolation) #70918
  • Allow ValueListBuilder to work with empty scratch spans #70917
    area-System.Collections
  • JIT: arm64 osr funclet frame probing #70916
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable AES encryption on Browser WASM #70915
    area-System.Security
  • [ignore][wasm] Add test trying to copy large array from javascript to wasm #70914
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Disable W^X on macOS under Rosetta emulation #70912
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn. #70911
  • [wasm-mt] Add MessageChannel between browser thread and new pthreads #70908
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Run optRedundantBranches twice and try to compute more accurate doms #70907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Pass CancellationToken to Http2Connection SetupAsync #70906
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] fixed distroRid having the last version digit for alpine (#62942) #70903
    community-contribution
  • Fix -cmakeargs option handling in build.sh #70901
    community-contribution
  • Generalize init block morphing a little #70899
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull in a couple more places #70897
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Enable IDE0100 (Remove redundant equality) #70896
    area-Meta
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use u8 in a few more places #70894
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Stop reordering arguments throwing distinct exceptions #70893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enabled WasmTestOnBrowser run on Windows for Browser. #70890
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Stop wrapping `SIMD` nodes in `OBJ`s #70888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • set red zone size 512 for powerpc64. #70885
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Avoid some unnecessary signed casts #70884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set NativeLib=Shared for classlib by default #70879
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: handle case where we are cloning adjacent sibling loops #70874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Tar Global Extended Attributes API changes #70869
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Add a minimal version of gsharedvt for llvmonly, enabled… #70867
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fixing the handling of Positive NaN in Math.Min for float/double #70865
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace the remaining uses of Marshal.PtrToStructure in core networking #70900
    area-System.Net
  • Fix ICorDebugFunction2::GetVersionNumber for arm32. #69901
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove #define Sleep #70868
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix bug in Tar preventing extraction of hardlinks or entries starting with `.\` #70853
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix failure building two libraries tests #70881
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for per-project customization of helix work items #70461
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add event to capture min/max threads #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Unpin locals, attempt 2 #70655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix for timer scheduling happening on the incorrect thread when wasm threading is enabled #70863
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, WASM, 7.0.0
  • Replace a few instances of PtrToStructure with more efficient marshalling #70866
    area-System.Net
  • Use hash/hmac one shots in NTLM #70857
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Enable IDE0020 (Use pattern matching) #70523
    area-Meta
  • Avoid crashing on unresolved dependencies #70871
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Generate method bodies for delegate Invoke methods #70883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve TLS1.3 detection in registry for QUIC #70730
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Use new byte[] span optimization in a few more places #70665
    area-Meta
  • Enable IDE0054 (Use compound assignment) #70564
    area-Meta
  • Use `Array.Empty()` in `System.Reflection.Metadata`. #70862
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Assign proper VNs to "shared constant" CSE defs #70852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64 - Optimize `i % 2` #70599
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Small performance cleanup in S.S.Cryptography #70847
    area-System.Security
  • Fix GC stress failure in LoaderAllocator::CompareExchangeValueInHandle #70832
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Restore ArchivingUtils.AttemptSetLastWriteTime #70617
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Delete StaticallyLinked property from Microsoft.NETCore.Native.Unix.props #70854
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: break loop canonicalization into two stages #70809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing the handling of Positive NaN in Math.Min for float/double #70795
    area-System.Numerics

Updated

  • Add TarEntry conversion constructors #70325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Use crypto.subtle for HMAC on Browser WASM #70745
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • VM: Better strategy for TryReserveInitialMemory on arm64 (jump stubs) #70707
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add AddSystemd() and AddWindowsService() IServiceCollection extension methods #68580
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Support long pdata unwinding and save_next for floating point regs in ARM64 #69906
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add support for cross module inlining and cross module generic compilation to Crossgen2 #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove allocation in ImmutableArray Builder Sort #70850
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix default log color behavior when console is redirected #70504
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [wasm] Migrate to ref/out param while reading data from typed array #70823
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Remove some dead code / branches #70146
    area-Meta
  • Upstream coreclr and pal changes to support powerpc (ppc64le) architecture #69105
    area-PAL-coreclr, arch-ppc64le
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Implement Tar async APIs #70574
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Extend MonoAOTCompiler Task #70851
    area-Build-mono
  • Optimization. Use Min/Max intrinsics if one of arguments is constant. #69434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Implement Vector128 version of System.Buffers.Text.Base64 DecodeFromUtf8 and EncodeToUtf8 #70654
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix C4018 warnings round II #70783
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Harden for null byrefs #70317
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • fix: [Wasm] Add missing libicudata.a for native layout #70682
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Initialize Generation Aware Analysis later #70764
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable lib tests that used to fail with GC issues #70831
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #70746
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Make the archives created on Unix have the read permissions by default #70735
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Implement NegotiateAuthentication API #70720
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan #70179
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Do not generate impossible instantiations for constrained generics in Mono AOT #70838
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support `PUTARG_SPLIT(STRUCT LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD)` on ARM/64 #70861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Add support for randomized guard stack cookies #70806
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Assertion prop fix #70643
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use `gtEffectiveVal` for `GT_ADD` op1 in `optCreateAssertion` #70228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Heuristic change for double constant adjustment #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix race condition between GCInfo and Rundown #70609
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tab completion does not fully work for `dotnet workload` #26071
  • Allow Runtime/Ref packs to contain multiple Target Platforms #26069

Closed

  • dotnet-sdk-6.0 version 6.0.301 on Ubuntu LTS 22.04 breaks the Q# Language Extension in Visual Studio Code #26065
  • Error parsing dotnet publish parameters when using ReadyToRun #3164
    Backlog
  • PublishReadyToRun uses outdated references from previous builds #21072
  • --self-contained value is not validated by the CLI #13196

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.SourceGenerator.Tooling.Internal from version.details.xml #26085
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Razor SG: Don't produce anything when suppressed #26084
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Reference older MSBuild for .NET Framework tasks #26080
  • older msbuild plus breaking update #26079
  • Change BrotliCompress response files to quote file paths #26077
    Area-CLI
  • add post actions tests for dotnet new #26074
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix typo in DefineStaticWebAssets.cs #25932

Updated

  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to work with when update available in newer feature band #25669
    Area-Workloads
  • add rules to catch addition or removal of 'virtual' modifier #25734
    Area-Compatibility
  • Update the default to Release for Pack/Pub in command building #25991
    Area-NetSDK
  • Support workload pack groups for repair, download, and show URL operations #25829
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #26048
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move ILLink targets to the linker repo #25993
    Area-Infrastructure
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make IFormattingInteractionService.GetFormattingChangesAsync synchronous #62003
  • Multi-caret paste into raw string does not indent correctly #62000
  • File types should work with EnC #61999
  • Make AbstractCodeActionComputer.GetIndentationAfter async #61998
  • FadeOutComplexObjectInitialization and FadeOutComplexCollectionInitialization options are not tested #61992
  • Revise `CompilerGeneratedAttribute` behavior when records are inherited #61991
  • Inheriting multiple generic collections, LINQ extensions lose smart hints #61985
  • Unable to use latest Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.* 4.3.x packages #61979
  • Merge CompletionServiceWithProviders into CompletionService #61977

Closed

  • C# Code Generator and Code Analyzer don't Recognize Nested Enum as Belonging to Current Generic Class #61281
    Backlog
  • Convert to interpolated string adds (object) to everything #61346
    17.3
  • Creating a value tuple with a non-existent field results in a confusing CS8619 #61462
    17.3
  • Mismatch between CSDiagnostic line number in message and location #61960
    17.3
  • VS doesn't navigate to Source Link for Console.WriteLine #61942
  • Inheriting multiple generic collections, LINQ extensions lose smart hints #61986
  • Embedded language detector and overloads #61982
  • Completion suggestion item bugs #61980
  • StringSyntax doesn't work on an attribute property assignment #61947
  • SemanticModel ignores evaluation context introduced by checked/unchecked expression #60419
    17.3
  • checked expression containing switch expression has no effect #61843
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Add analyzers to unnecessary nullable directives #62004
    Area-IDE
  • Read syntax tree, source text and options synchronously in command handlers #62002
    Area-IDE
  • Fix deadlock during the startup of diagnostics #62001
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61997
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify embedded languages type hierarchy #61994
    Area-IDE
  • Move `CompilerGeneratedAttribute` from `EqualityContract` get accessor to the property itself #61993
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix stack overflow in CSharpStringIndentationService #61978
    Area-IDE
  • Fix project based CompletionProvider #61976
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense

Merged

  • Simplify brace completion code. #61996
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add a fast exit check for type-argument-list brace completion to help avoid semantic work when unnecessary #61995
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Point workitems to the PR & clarification comment #61988
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Do not add cast to object when converting string.Format to interpolated string #61969
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Skip assignment nullability warning in error case #61895
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge semantic snippets into main #61658
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Read editorconfig options from the editor in GetInferredFormattingOptions #61968
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61989
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add all references when finding symbols in implementation assemblies #61953
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not report populate switch diagnostic when switch type is unknown #61809
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61987
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Support embedded lang features when overload resolution fails #61984
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61983
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix reported accessibility issues with StackTrace Explorer #61970
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix race condition in FixAll tests based off TrackNodes functionality #61958
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix logic issue in find-refs that could fail to find related symbols in inheritance #61972
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61981
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Support embedded languages on named attribute arguments #61951
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61975
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Bind switch expression with checked-aware binder #61890
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • New hot reload interfaces #60219
    Area-Interactive
  • Global options tests #61872
    Area-IDE
  • Do not show name suggestions after event name #61807
    Area-IDE, Community
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Document Outline Tool Window #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Support virtual conversion and equality operators #61963
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Shadow Copy all analyzer dependencies #61974
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add compliance pipeline for running APIScan #61905
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge CompletionServiceWithProviders into CompletionService #61943
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • Editor config mapping #61899
    Area-IDE
  • Use native azdo command for checkout #61965
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [EnC] Allow deleting method #61806
    Area-Compilers
  • changes needed to build Roslyn.sln on unix #61959
  • Simplify implementation of the FindRefsCache helper type #61941
    Area-IDE
  • Provide parse options to the language service more quickly #60855
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `blazorwasm` Template Baseline Tests #42267
  • Blazor Wasm Publish Error: error MSB6006: "C:\Program Files\dotnet" exited with code 1. since VS 17.2.4 update #42262
  • Support automatically registering OpenAPI security schemes in authenticated apps #42261
    .NET 8 Planning
  • UserStore should use IDbContextFactory<TContext> (instead of just TContext) if available #42260
    Backlog
  • TryConvert with custom ContractResolver release date #42259
  • Blazor WASM with Static Web App Random net::ERR_HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERROR #42256
  • RequireHost and reverse proxy #42252

Closed

  • Latency during model binding #42116
  • SVG links cause full page reload #42213
  • HttpResponse.ContentType is marked as String but is null sometimes #42222
  • Implicitly added AuthN/AuthZ middleware leads to unexpected behavior #42240
    7.0-preview6
  • AspNetCore.DataProtection deserialize a key file serialised (with nuget 5.0.x) using nuget 6.0.x lead to Invalid Payload exception #42111
  • No SignalR server ping when using WebHost and IHostApplicationLifetime #41833
  • Cannot resolve ApiController in unit tests of the IoC container #42153
  • Getting Unwanted error logs in console. #42228
  • Add BlazorServer into Ansible Galaxy #42255
  • Deploy Blazor WASM with MySQL on Ubuntu (Ansible) #42253
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.6.22310.18] https://localhost:5001 is not listened for Asp.Net Core apps that use Https #42161
  • Add Blazor WASM into Ansible Galaxy #42254
  • `TryUpdateModelAsync()` doesn't account for Nullable Reference Types in navigation properties of the model #41886
    7.0-preview6
  • Make `dotnet user-jwts create` scriptable #42146
    7.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • Add missing @-sign on bot comment #42270
    area-infrastructure
  • Make H2 WebSockets ignore MaxRequestBodySize and MinRequestBodyDataRate #42269
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Unskip Playwright BlazorTemplates.Tests #42266
    area-mvc, feature-templates, playwright 🎭
  • Add AuthorizationBuilder #42264
    area-security
  • macOS dev-certs overhaul #42251
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts
  • [main] Move to MCR for dotnet/runtime-deps #42248
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Move to MCR for dotnet/runtime-deps #42247
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] Move to MCR for dotnet/runtime-deps #42246
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/2.1] Move to MCR for dotnet/runtime-deps #42245
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, tell-mode, 2.1.x

Merged

  • Partition more ConcurrentQueues in Kestrel #42237
    area-runtime, blog-candidate, 7.0-preview6
  • Update fabricbot with new schema and blog-candidate rule #42263
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • Fix auto-registeration of authN and authZ middlewares #42250
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview6
  • Use Vector instead of direct Intrinsics #41790
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview6
  • Fix nullability of TryUpdateModelAsync #41959
    feature-Model-Binding, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview6
  • Fix flakyServerReset_AfterEndStream_NoError test #42030
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Add support for --output option in user-jwts create #42249
    area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts, 7.0-preview6
  • Remove generation of schemas in OpenAPI package #42169
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • [Route Groups] Support AddFilter, WithOpenApi and other additive conventions #42195
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-actions, feature-minimal-hosting
  • Empty Blazor WebAssembly Project Template #42215
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Empty Blazor Server Project Template #42079
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Add generic method overloads to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results static class #42176
    area-runtime
  • HttpSys log correct statuscode when application throws #42223
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime
  • [SignalR] Replace Single(connectionId) with Client(connectionId) and Caller #42236
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet-dump fails HRESULT: 0x00000000 not single file app #3118
    7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Web Development #8144
  • Set dark icons for lightTheme #8143
  • Canvas does not work AT ALL outside of constructor #8142

  • [Windows] List view is flickered while Itemsource is dynamically updated #8137
  • [Android] CollectionView and other control's visibility do not update from Binding #8135

Closed

  • ANDROID Shell.Current.GoToAsync doesn't work if Shell.PresentationMode="ModalAnimated" #8038
  • Image with different format not working In IOS #8036
  • Can't find my app resource file with iOS #7722

PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1 #8054
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Fix Modal Navigation with Shell #8117

  • Fix for #5523 MauiWebView not loading local files on Windows #7672
    platform/windows 🪟, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Fix issue creating ColorStateLists from extension methods #7527
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #7335
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr2
  • Fix issue rendering Brushes binding GradientStop colors #7719
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr3
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix Button appearance on Catalyst using UIDeviceFamily 6 #7841
    t/bug, area/desktop 🖥️, control-button, 6.0-sr3

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Terrible documentation for many to many relationships #28262
  • Use C# 11 raw string literals #28260
    MQ
  • Why is there a GitHub Project in this repo #28259
  • Group By subquery when applied on another Query throws InvalidOperation Exception #28258
    Backlog
  • Integration with EF - Disposable Queries #28257
  • efcore 6.0.6 notmapped apply datetime property is invalid #28256

Closed

  • Cosmos: Fixup to Regex.IsMatch translation #28139
    7.0.0
  • How to get column names of owned entity types #28241
  • Migration with comment #28239
  • register DbContext with AddPooledDbContextFactory with TContextService & TContextImplementation #28229
  • Version 6.0.6 Does not support 3.1 #28225
  • Add additional overloads to provider ServiceCollectionExtensions methods. #28217
  • Nullable data types different behavior in OwnsOne usage #28201
  • Is there a way to skip a property from insert? #28255
  • `dotnet-ef migrations add` starts entire application when CreateHostBuilder method is not present #28105

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fixup to Cosmos regex translation #28261
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
  • Update to .NET SDK 7 Preview 5 #28250
  • Add support for CSharpHelper for List literals #28212
  • [release/3.1] Tools: Enable .NET Framework projects targeting win-arm64 #28254
    Servicing-consider
  • "Scaffold" triggers for SQL Server #28253
